text: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
translation: and the fifth [oath] is that may Allah’s wrath be upon her if he is telling the truth[5].
footnotes: [5] It is called li‘ān; once the husband and the wife swear each five times, the marriage is terminated forever.
